verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, when <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had given <S%H5117>rest<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from all their <S%H341>enemies<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> was <S%H2204>old<s%> and well <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H3117>years<s%>;

that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, for their <S%H2205>elders<s%> and for their <S%H7218>heads<s%>, and for their <S%H8199>judges<s%> and for their <S%H7860>officers<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2204>them<s%>, I am old and well <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H3117>years<s%>:

and ye have <S%H7200>seen<s%> all that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> unto all these <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H3068>you<s%>; for Jehovah your <S%H430>God<s%>, he it is that hath fought for <S%H3898>you<s%>.

Behold <S%H7200><s%>, I have <S%H5307>allotted<s%> unto you these <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H7604>remain<s%>, to be an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> for your <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, from the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, with all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that I have cut <S%H3772>off<s%>, even unto the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> toward the going down of the <S%H3996>sun<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, he will <S%H1920>thrust<s%> them out from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3423>you<s%>, and drive them from out of your <S%H6440>sight<s%>; and ye shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%>, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> spake unto <S%H1696>you<s%>.

Therefore be ye <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2388>courageous<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> and to <S%H6213>do<s%> all that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, that ye <S%H5493>turn<s%> not aside therefrom to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left<s%>;

that ye <S%H935>come<s%> not among these <S%H1471>nations<s%>, these that <S%H7604>remain<s%> among <S%H2142>you<s%>; neither make mention of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of their <S%H430>gods<s%>, nor cause to <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H5647>them<s%>, neither serve <S%H7812>them<s%>, nor bow down yourselves unto them;
but <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, as ye have <S%H6213>done<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath driven <S%H3423>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H6099>strong<s%>; but as for <S%H376>you<s%>, no man hath <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

One <S%H259><s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of you shall <S%H7291>chase<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%>; for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, he it is that <S%H3898>fighteth<s%> for <S%H1696>you<s%>, as he spake unto you.
Take <S%H3966>good<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> therefore unto <S%H5315>yourselves<s%>, that ye <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

Else if ye do at <S%H7725>all<s%> go <S%H7725>back<s%>, and <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of these <S%H1471>nations<s%>, even these that <S%H7604>remain<s%> among <S%H2859>you<s%>, and make marriages with <S%H935>them<s%>, and go in unto them, and they to you;

know <S%H3045><s%> for a <S%H3045>certainty<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will no <S%H3254>more<s%> drive these <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H3423>out<s%> of your <S%H6440>sight<s%>; but they shall be a <S%H6341>snare<s%> and a <S%H4170>trap<s%> unto <S%H7850>you<s%>, and a scourge in your <S%H6654>sides<s%>, and <S%H6796>thorns<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, until ye <S%H6>perish<s%> from off this <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H127>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath given <S%H5414>you<s%>.

And <S%H3117><s%>, behold, this day I am <S%H1980>going<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth<s%>: and ye <S%H3045>know<s%> in all your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> and in all your <S%H5315>souls<s%>, that not <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> hath <S%H5307>failed<s%> of all the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> concerning <S%H935>you<s%>; all are come to pass unto <S%H259>you<s%>, not one <S%H1697>thing<s%> hath failed <S%H5307>thereof<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H2896>pass<s%>, that as all the good <S%H1697>things<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> upon you of which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H3068>you<s%>, so will Jehovah <S%H935>bring<s%> upon you all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%>, until he have <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> you from off this <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H127>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath given <S%H5414>you<s%>.

When ye <S%H5674>transgress<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H1980>you<s%>, and go and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H7812>bow<s%> down yourselves to <S%H639>them<s%>; then will the anger of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H6>you<s%>, and ye shall perish <S%H4120>quickly<s%> from off the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> which he hath given unto <S%H5414>you<s%>.
